domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

text:
Amanda Holden is pushing the theory that COVID19 symptoms are a result of 5g.  And that when they turn the masts on properly, we'll all be killed.

The thing is, some ppl will think "A celebrity said it, so it must be true."
